attributes.action: Invitation to Seamus Heaney to address Lough Erne Summit?
attributes.additional_details: Will the Prime Minister emulate William Hague's invitation to Angelina Jolie to address the G8 foreign ministers on violence against women, by requesting the (Northern) Irish poet Seamus Heaney to raise the spirits of the G8 heads of government at the June Lough Erne summit, if not to translate the final declaration into verse?
